QuestData.Title: The Tortured Earth
QuestData.Description: Bring up the usurper. You will find him. Follow earthen path. First you put to rest tortured earth spirits. Must sleep once more.$B$B<Gordawg smashes his fist into the ground and brings up very foul smelling soil.>$B$BMust sleep!$B$B<Gordawg points southeast.>$B$BFind spirits near mountains. Near hills. Near rocks. Near earth.$B$BPut to sleep.$B$BTelaari Basin... Southeast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gordawg at the Throne of the Elements in Nagrand has asked that you destroy 10 Tortured Earth Spirits.
QuestData.RewardText: <Gordawg nods in approval.>$B$BGood. Spirits sleep now.
